Pre-Game Insights: Delray Rawlins is not intimidated by facing Canada
Canada are ranked 19th while Bermuda are ranked 32nd
Canada arrived on the island a day earlier than Cayman Islands and Panama
Delray Rawlins is not worried about the match
Delray Rawlins believes T20 cricket presents every team with a chance to succeed
Bermuda have a lot of players who have the capabilities of going out to get big runs or going through teams
Delray Rawlins is confident that they will come out on top due to their home advantage and familiarity with the conditions
Others: Bermuda have never been to a T20 World Cup
The existing crop of players have been presented with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to write their names in the island’s history books
Delray Rawlins made a plea to the fans to give the players the extra motivation they need to qualify for the World Cup
The captain made a plea to the fans to get behind us, this is the biggest thing that’s happened in Bermuda cricket in a long time
